name: Compelling Reason to Act
description: Framework for creating urgency and motivating immediate action

steps.name: Create Scarcity - Establish limited availability
steps.description: Identify what makes this opportunity unique, limited, or unlikely to be available again

steps.description: Articulate exactly what needs to be done, by when, and by whom to address the compelling reason

steps.name: Create Accountability - Establish tracking and follow-up
